dsmml_init_info¶

DSMML structure for passing initialization input arguments into the library

Synopsis¶

typedef struct dsmml_init_info {
    int     mype;
    int     smp_mype;
    int     smp_npes;
} dsmml_init_info_t;

Members¶

mype        my PE index information
smp_mype    my local PE index
smp_npes    total number of local PEs

Notes¶

Refer dsmml_init(3)
